title: Corrupt-a-wish
body:
The rules- I wish for something and the next prson that comments must answer that wish but corrupt it, then make their own wish.
>   EXAMPLE-
blue- I wish to be out of bronze
red- granted, but they remove bronze from the game straight after.
> i wish....


Sorry for the bad example. also, when answering you must say granted at the start.
i'll start

I wish they removed riven
